pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Mississippi Department of Archives and History
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains a variety of materials, including compositions, correspondence, military records, newsclippings, oral history transcripts, photographs, political campaign ephemera and memorabilia, printed material, public relations material, scrapbooks, slides, sound recordings, speeches, subject files and miscellany. May contain information relating to Pittman's role as president of Tylertown Broadcasting Company and general manager of WTYL AM-FM.
